description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 9 October 2018 (RN: 18/02029/FULL) for, 'Erection of an additional storey at fourth floor level at the rear on the Margaret Court frontage and widening of the link building within the central lightwell at first to fourth floor levels to extend existing office (Class B1) floorspace. External alterations including the creation of terraces at second, third, fourth and roof levels (all for use in association with enlarged office (Class B1) floorspace). Installation of screened plant at new roof level and creation of a new frontage and pedestrian access onto Margaret Court. Use of basement and rear ground floor unit as a restaurant (Class A3)'; NAMELY, to allow the following amendments to the approved development: (i) The addition of plant to the roof level (supply fan, ductwork, and attentuator section) with associated plant screens; and (ii) Addition of facade penetration and exhaust grilles on the 2nd and 4th floor level.
